title: Huge fps drops that started in 6.18. Only league affected
body:
Title says it all. Since 6.18 I noticed huge fps drops in league.
As soon as I get to lane, fps drops from ~120 to 30-40 for a second, then goes back up. Keeps jumping up and down.

Drivers are latest, no major changes to PC in a long time. Fps drops started since 6.18.
Tried disabling pretty much every other software on pc, still the same. 
No other game is dropping fps only league of legends.

Ran out of things to try.

replies.body:
I'm having the same issue with my FPS, i tried about everything on the FPS troubleshooter my computer it was perfectly fine until a week or two ago.  But i ha to o a ticket and d o the hextech repair tool..havnet heard anything back yet hopefully it work

I know how annoying it can be so i wish you luck on fixing the problem!

It's good that you've taken steps to update your drivers, as that can be culprit of fps issues.  There may be other factors as well such as bad game files too.  I suggest using our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for a clean sweep of steps to ensure your PC is tuned up to game.  This should get you fixed up, but let me know if you have any questions!

Nothing from the FPS troubleshooter list helped. Also, most if it is not supposed to help, because like I said it started since 6.18 and no other game has any issues. So can't be malware, cant be settings. But I did everything from the list anyway, obviously no improvement.

Thanks for trying, though it sucks you're still having the issue.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and download a set of logs for our tech team to look at.  Attach them in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll help out with your specific issue individually.  We'll respond asap!
